card_onboarding.title: Insert new content
card_onboarding.content: You can easily add a Block or Section from Insert Panel, where contains all basic elements and section templates to build your page.

card_onboarding.title: Sync all styles with one click
card_onboarding.content: Feel tired when you have to edit font and color many times? Don’t worry. Let’s open Website Style and setup one time, then entire typography and color in your Website will be synced up.

card_onboarding.title: Layer management
card_onboarding.content: Here, you can view all the layers that structure your current web page. You can rearrange elements within a section and independently show or hide elements on different devices.

card_onboarding.title: Website Settings
card_onboarding.content: Website settings is where you can easily change general information such as logo, SEO content, password, language, product, cart goal,...

card_onboarding.title: Page selection
card_onboarding.content: Here is where you can select page type such as Homepage, Product page, Collection page, About us,... to customize.

card_onboarding.title: Change page template
card_onboarding.content: Here, you can apply a new page template from the extensive library provided by ShopBase. Explore a wide variety of page templates to find the perfect fit for your needs.

card_onboarding.title: Configuration settings
card_onboarding.content: Each element can be configured through settings on the left sidebar. You can use these settings to customize content and design of elements to your liking.

card_onboarding.title: Save page as template
card_onboarding.content: You can save page as template to reuse for the next time.
